member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.InternalObjectModel.LayoutRow.SetBottomBorder
member.summary: Force setup bottom borders for the table row.
member.remarks: In fact, for internal cells, the lower bounds are skipped because we use the top border for the next cell in the table column to avoid duplicating the bounds between internal cells.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.InternalObjectModel.LayoutRow.TransformCellsForMerge
member.summary: Transforms cells to merge from old style to new one. Merge criteria in old style is composition of two cells format parameters: cell.Source.Format.HorizontalMerge = and for each merged cells cell.Source.Format.HorizontalMerge = New style supposed to engage new format property and delete merged cells.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.LayoutTable.AddHeaderRows(System.Int32)
member.summary: Added header rows to the top of the table splitted part if needed.
member.param: Index of top row of the table splitted part.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.LayoutTable.HeaderRowsFitToPage(GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.InternalObjectModel.LayoutRow[])
member.summary: Simulate MS Word behavior. If header rows do not fit into the page headers rows should not be repeated at the next page.
member.param: Header rows.
member.returns: True if header rows fit into the page and false otherwise.

member.summary: Specifies how comments are handled during export.

member.summary: Comments are not exported.

member.summary: Highlight only commented text, comments are not exported.

member.summary: All comments data is exported.

member.summary: Gets or sets the compression level. Default value is .

member.summary: Gets or sets a object containing information about the document (author, title, etc). See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.ImageOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets an object with options controlling how images are handled when added to the PDF. See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.Linearized
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the generated PDF should be linearized. See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.Metadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a metadata object associated with the generated PDF. See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.PdfACompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the document should be PDF/A compliant. See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.PdfVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the PDF Version of the generated document. See for details.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions.CommentsMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how to handle comments during export.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocumentExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for converting to other formats.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocumentExtensions.SaveAsPdf(GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocument,System.IO.Stream,GrapeCity.Documents.Text.FontCollection,GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions)
member.summary: Saves the current as PDF to a specified stream.
member.param: The instance to convert to PDF.
The destination stream.

The with fonts to be used during conversion. In a Windows environment this can be null, in which case Windows system fonts will be used. In a non-Windows environment not specifying this parameter may cause the conversion to fail.
The controlling the conversion.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocumentExtensions.SaveAsPdf(GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocument,System.IO.Stream,System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions)
member.summary: Saves the current as PDF to a specified stream.
member.param: The instance to convert to PDF.
The destination stream.

The path to a directory with fonts to be used during conversion. In a Windows environment this can be null, in which case Windows system fonts will be used. In a non-Windows environment not specifying this parameter may cause the conversion to fail.
The controlling the conversion.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocumentExtensions.SaveAsPdf(GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocument,System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Text.FontCollection,GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions)
member.summary: Saves the current as PDF to a specified file.
member.param: The instance to convert to PDF.
The destination file name.

The with fonts to be used during conversion. In a Windows environment this can be null, in which case Windows system fonts will be used. In a non-Windows environment not specifying this parameter may cause the conversion to fail.
The controlling the conversion.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocumentExtensions.SaveAsPdf(GrapeCity.Documents.Word.GcWordDocument,System.String,System.String,GrapeCity.Documents.Layout.PdfConversionOptions)
member.summary: Saves the current as PDF to a specified file.
member.param: The instance to convert to PDF.
The destination file name.

The path to a directory with fonts to be used during conversion. In a Windows environment this can be null, in which case Windows system fonts will be used. In a non-Windows environment not specifying this parameter may cause the conversion to fail.
The controlling the conversion.
